summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Fir Street, from Twentieth Avenue to Twenty Third Avenue in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing and constructing concrete sidewalk under Ordinance No. 14964, creating Local Improvement District No. 1318 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
